casebody.data:
CLARK, II
v.
JOYNER, et al. 17P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For NC Dept. of Public Safety

Joseph Earl Clark, II, For Clark, Joseph Earl (II)

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of January 2019 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
